sentences.en: Allgood served on the bench for more than 50 years.
sentences.cn: 奥尔古德当了五十多年的法官。

sentences.en: Each bench will seat four persons.
He pushed her away and she fell back on the wooden bench.
sentences.cn: 他把她推开，她向后跌坐到长木椅上。

sentences.en: he retired after twenty-five years on the bench.
sentences.cn: 他当了25年的法官后退休。

sentences.en: Ian Ferguson was preferred to Stuart McCall, who was on the bench.
sentences.cn: 伊恩·弗格森比坐在替补席上的斯图尔特·麦考尔更受器重。

sentences.en: Moira stretched herself out on the lower bench.
sentences.cn: 莫伊拉在较矮的长椅上躺下了。

sentences.en: My father's working bench was covered with a cloth and his coffin was laid there.
sentences.cn: 爸爸的工作台上盖了一块布，他的灵枢就陈放在那儿。

sentences.en: She approached a young couple holding hands on a bench.
sentences.cn: 她走近一对手拉手坐在长椅上的年轻情侣。

sentences.en: She chose a bench beside the duck pond and sat down.
sentences.cn: 她在鸭塘边找了条长椅坐下。

sentences.en: The back of the bench folds forward to make a table.
sentences.cn: 长凳的靠背可以向前翻折成一张桌子。

sentences.en: The chairman of the bench adjourned the case until October 27.
sentences.cn: 主审法官将案件延期到10月27日审理。

sentences.en: The crowd around the bench began to melt away.
sentences.cn: 长椅周围的人群渐渐散去了。

sentences.en: The runaway car careered into a bench, hitting an elderly couple.
sentences.cn: 那辆失控的车猛冲到一条长椅上，撞伤了一对老夫妇。

sentences.en: There's a bench under a poplar tree.
They stopped and sat on a park bench.
sentences.cn: 他们停下来，坐在公园长椅上。

sentences.en: We sat down on the park bench and watched the children play.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在公园的长凳上,看儿童嬉戏.

sentences.en: We sat on a park bench.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在公园的长椅上。

phrases.tran_cn: 台阶高度；工作台高度；露天矿阶段高度
台架试验；小型试验（比实验室大，比中型试验小）
净化工作台；无尘无菌操作台
议会的前座（为反对党领袖保留的座位）

trans.tran_cn: 长凳，工作台，议员席，法官席，替补席
trans.tran_en: a long seat for two or more people, especially outdoors
